Pre-Apocalypse[]: Nothing is known about Gavin's life prior to or as the outbreak began, except that he was a doctor at St. Ignatius Hospital in Atlanta, working as an oncologist. He and Dr. Steven Edwards were former colleagues.
Post-Apocalypse[]: Dr. Gavin Trevitt was found after he fell from a first floor apartment building trying to get away from walkers. Dawn Lerner wanted Gavin alive at all costs, as he was a doctor. However, Dr. Steven Edwards thought he couldn't save him, as he had internal bleeding and a collapsed lung. Beth Greene (under orders from Steven) injects Gavin with 75mg of clozapine , causing him to seize and then flat-line. Gavin is then put down by Dawn before he can turn. Beth later finds out that Gavin was a colleague of Steven's and he purposely made her inject Gavin with the wrong medicine so that he could remain the only doctor at the hospital, ensuring that he didn't become disposable to Dawn and the other officers.
Death[]: Killed By Steven Edwards (Caused) Beth Greene (Accidental) Gavin dies from a seizure after purposely having been given an injection of clozapine, by an unknowing Beth. Dawn Lerner (Before Reanimation) Later, he is stabbed in the head with scissors by Dawn to prevent reanimation.
Killed Victims[]: This list shows the victims Gavin has killed: Possibly numerous counts of zombies
Trivia[]: Gavin is Beth Greene 's first named human kill, albeit accidentally.
